prompts.prompt: List all users in the tenant, showing their display name, email, job title, and department.

template.name: list-all-users
template.title: List all users
template.description: Lists all users in the organization and shows basic details.

prompts.prompt: Show all deleted users, including their display name, email, and deletion date.

template.name: list-deleted-users
template.title: List deleted users
template.description: Lists all deleted users currently in the Azure AD recycle bin.

prompts.prompt: Get all available details for user {userDisplayName}. Include display name, email, job title, department, office location, and account status.

template.name: get-user-details
template.title: Get user details
template.description: Fetches detailed user information by display name.

arguments.name: userDisplayName
arguments.description: The user's display name (exact or partial match).

prompts.prompt: List all groups and directory roles for user {userDisplayName}. Show group/role name and type.

template.name: list-user-groups
template.title: List user groups and roles
template.description: Lists all groups and directory roles a user is member of, matched by display name.

arguments.name: userDisplayName
arguments.description: The user's display name (exact or partial match).

prompts.prompt: Who is the manager of user {userDisplayName}? Show their name, email, and job title.

template.name: get-user-manager
template.title: Get user's manager
template.description: Shows the manager of a user matched by display name.

arguments.name: userDisplayName
arguments.description: The user's display name (exact or partial match).

prompts.prompt: Show all users who report directly to user {userDisplayName}. Include their display name, email, and job title.

template.name: list-direct-reports
template.title: List user's direct reports
template.description: Lists all users who directly report to the specified user matched by display name.

arguments.name: userDisplayName
arguments.description: The user's display name (exact or partial match).
